wikitext.*:
The '''Società Tolkieniana Italiana''' (Italian: "Italian Tolkien Society") was founded in [[1994]] as a non-profit, non-political association. They publish two journals, [https://www.tolkien.it/categoria-prodotto/pubblicazioni-sti/terra-di-mezzo/ Terra di Mezzo] (Middle-earth) and [https://www.tolkien.it/categoria-prodotto/pubblicazioni-sti/minas-tirith/ Minas Tirith]. Their annual three day national convention is called "Hobbiton", and is usually held in the first week of September. The society organises meetings, lectures, seminars, and art exhibitions around [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]'s works.
